name: DEATH IS NOT THE END (markovich)
description:
DEATH IS NOT THE END is an old-fashion side-scroller but with some new interesting mechanics. This game provides some nostalgia vibe but at the same time offers a new experience.

Warning! This is an early-prototype to so that you can get acquainted with mechanics and atmosphere.

CONTROLS:
"A/D" or "Left/Right" to move
"Space" to jump
"E" to make some boogie
"R" to unmake boogie
"Q" to throw your beauty
If you will unmaky boogie when your beauty in a adventure you can see a some new results.

Press "P" to restart the game if something goes wrong.

WE HOPE YOU WILL ENJOY! ;3
